replies.body: And here i thought singed was going to wither away
I mean he's almost got more bandages than Amumu does, I think he's safe.

looll i guess but it isnt like bandages are gonna save u from ammumu  anyhow

he'll cry onto them, make them wet and rip them off and give u a kiss that will make u wither into nothinginess
SInged should really add Amumu's tears on his potions

The rule is amumu can't have friends, but what if his friend didn't consider himself a friend but only wanted to exploit amumu. bam, loophole. singed amumu besties for life, or until singed has all the stuff that he can take from amumu.

Of course! The rule for their non friendship is that Amumu must chase Singed forever.
Brilliant!

I did something similar in URF when I was Singed . My team was losing and an enemy Urgot was sh#t talking the entire game. When they got to the Nexus, Urgot and a Quinn were assaulting it from beside the shop. I got a double kill.
